basics.name: Blake Watkins
basics.label: Programmer
basics.summary: Currently I'm focusing on building and sharpening my skills in web development. I enjoy programming for both front and back end environments, which includes keeping current on frameworks, new ES standards and releases, and having fun with Node and it's rich environment. I have a deep love for linguistic inquiry, which has bridged me into the realm of computation and programming, and also has me very interested in functional programming concepts.

work.summary: Working on various development projects for non-profits and private parties.

summary: Provided counseling and therapeutic services for persons with acute mental health diagnoses, within a transitional facility
Managed project that fully transitioned organization of 200+ employees to an EMR cloud-based service

projects.name: mirageJS
summary: Developed methods to layer and manipulate video streams and canvasses by utilizing canvas, webRTC, and TrackingJS APIs
Deployed javascript library API via NPM, that accepts custom animation functions, exposes data channel and stream events, and optionally offers an audio/video capable component
Utilized web worker contexts to optimize complex canvas and tracking operations
Built communication logic with websocket and REST API over HTTPS, inserting hooks into webRTC signaling to establish client connections
Designed functionality on back end to persist identifying client data within socket events, permitting dynamic member and room CRUD operations

projects.name: Sip
summary: Constructed node streams to issue portions of readfile data dependent on specific client-side requests
Developed front and backend APIs to enable server side middleware operations
Scaled concatenation of back end data streams, piping data for both input/output logic to set up final client payload

projects.name: Spik-izi
summary: Created API logic controller within React framework to serve as user friendly linguistic aide for educational purposes
Setup RESTful API to serve custom etymological data upon AJAX requests
Utilized React library to architect a system of modular components to enable reusability of components

volunteer.summary: Providing assistance to organization's drop-in services.

education.distinctions: Highest Honors in Linguistics, Highest Honors in Classical Studies, Summa cum Laude
